description: Section 73 application to vary Condition 2 (Approved Drawings and Documents) - for changes to internal configuration of building; changes to exterior of building including in respect of some windows, doors, balconies and detailing; changes to landscaping and boundary treatments including boundary wall heights; reconfiguration of car parking, refuse and cycle storage, amenity space and inclusion of Booster break-tank room - attached to planning permission 17/03647/FUL dated 10.12.2019 which granted planning permission for;"Demolition of the existing outbuildings on site and erection of 23 no. new residential units comprising 6 x 1 bedroom flats, 11 x 2 bedroom flats, 6 x 3 bedroom flats, together with 2no. car parking spaces, cycle parking provision, refuse and recycling provision, a relocated vehicular access to the service road and landscaping and associated works".
